text:
Have you tried this? 
1.Stop the Windows Update and Bits services(It may be necessary to disable both
to prevent Windows restarting them
2. Delete the staging folders
 - Software Distribution folder
 - “C:\$Windows.~BT” folder
3. Then proceed with configuring the Product Version and Target version in the
registry or GPO. Restart the device once done. 
Product Version in reg key =
%40BYAPR05MB6552.namprd05.prod.outlook.com

metadata.topic: RE: WSUS: New Update(s) Alert From WSUS

metadata.email_text_original:
RE: WSUS: New Update(s) Alert From WSUS 
Have you tried this? 
1.Stop the Windows Update and Bits services(It may be necessary to disable both
to prevent Windows restarting them
2. Delete the staging folders
 - Software Distribution folder
 - “C:\$Windows.~BT” folder
3. Then proceed with configuring the Product Version and Target version in the
registry or GPO. Restart the device once done. 
Product Version in reg key =
